FuncDef:
The ip route-static selection-rule relay-depth command configures static routes to be selected based on recursion depths.
The undo ip route-static selection-rule relay-depth command cancels the configuration. The ip route-static selection-rule relay-depth command configures static routes to be selected based on recursion depths. The undo ip route-static selection-rule relay-depth command cancels the configuration. By default, static routes are not selected based on recursion depths.
ExtraInfo: To prevent inter-board service transmission or routing loop in a static route scenario, configure recursion depth-based static route selection.
